- **Portfolio remains tech-focused**: Concentrated in high-quality mega-cap technology leaders with strong competitive moats

### **Portfolio Characteristics:**
✅ Diversified across major tech sectors (semiconductors, cloud, consumer tech, AI/data, ad tech)
✅ Quality-focused with industry leaders

✅ Fully invested with minimal cash drag
